p: Complete IRIS staging was obtained in 30 out of the 52 cats with CKD (58%). Two cats were on stage I (both hypertensive), 8 cats were on stage II (6 hypertensive, 2 non‐hypertensive), 11 cats were on stage III (9 hypertensive, 2 non‐hypertensive) and 9 cases were on stage IV (8 hypertensive, 1 non‐hypertensive).
